title: Only I have lags?
body:
FPS and Ping are fine, but still lagging/freezing.

Freezing for a few seconds.

It has begun a month ago.

P.S I know that my friends have the same thing.

replies.body: it's important to find out if this is being caused by a connection issue like packet loss, or an fps problem likely caused by bad drivers.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) in this case so we can get an overview of your case.  Let me know the results you get!
http://prntscr.com/g41yx5    drivers are all up to date

Thanks!  You connection looks solid!  If you're having frame skips then your drivers or game files could be acting up.  I recommend doing a custom game and going through each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune things up.  I hope that helps!

i did the fps thing and when i played today  had the same thing

attempt to reconnect/lag      here is a new pic log reader http://prntscr.com/g487ce

The initial log may not have been for an impacted game then, because these new ones indicate some pretty severe connection issues.  It's seems clear now that your network might be unstable and suddenly degrading while connected to the game server.  

You should instead run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune that up, but it's really important you test it in a custom game to prevent penalties.

i did the network netalyzr thing and this thing shows up                                                                                                     
                    
 â€¢You are listed on a significant DNS blacklist

i have same freeze/lag   since the new patch

rly annoying. cant even play ranked


happened to my friend too maybe something wrong with the eune server
